A history of gestational hypertension exposes the patient to a ''risk of chronic hypertension'' as well as an increased risk of cardiovascular and renal pathologies, hence the importance of appropriate subsequent monitoring++++

properties.question: What are the long-term complications associated with a history of gestational hypertension?
properties.option_a: Risk of chronic hypertension and increased risk of cardiovascular diseases
properties.option_b: Reduced risk of diabetes and improved kidney function
properties.option_c: Increased risk of respiratory infections and lung diseases
properties.option_d: Enhanced immune response and lower chances of autoimmune diseases
